item.description:
So sayeth our Charity Coordinator:

It's time for another charity knit meetup! This time we'll knit cat toys for the Cocheco Valley Humane Society (the shelter where my own three lovelies adopted me). Bring scrap yarn and needles for a favorite cat toy pattern...here's one and here's another to get you started. I'll have fluffy stuffing, catnip, sewing needles, and thread on hand. The toys will be delivered to CVHS a couple of weeks after our meetup to give us time to felt.

I'll make two big pots of soup and bread for what I hope will be a wintery January afternoon. You do not need to bring anything foody or drinky...but if you insist, post it in your comment on the RSVP so that we don't double up. My usual caution...people with cat allergies will not be comfortable at my place! Meow...

Allison's number: (612) 877-0322
item.name: Knittin' for Kittens (and Cats) -Sunday Jan. 10th
